description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Starlight is a Puzzle Platformer about shifting between worlds. The game world exits on two planes, and the player is tasked with jumping between these two parallel worlds in order to collect every star. The game becomes increasingly more complex when new elements are introduced such as changing the gravitational pull.
